mainEntity.name: What is the best NFL betting site?

acceptedAnswer.text: FanDuel is our top-rated NFL betting site for most users, offering excellent same-game parlay options, competitive odds, and a strong mobile app. However, the best site depends on your preferences - DraftKings excels in rewards programs, BetMGM in live betting, and Bet365 for experienced bettors. All are licensed and regulated in the US.

mainEntity.name: Are NFL betting apps legal in the US?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, NFL betting apps are legal in 31+ US states. The 2018 Supreme Court decision allowed states to regulate sports betting independently. You must be at least 21 years old and in a state where sports betting is legal. Check your state's gaming commission website for current regulations and available sportsbooks.

mainEntity.name: What are the best welcome bonuses for NFL betting?

acceptedAnswer.text: Top welcome bonuses include: FanDuel up to $300, BetMGM up to $1,500, DraftKings up to $1,200, and Caesars up to $1,250. Always review wagering requirements and terms. Most bonuses require a qualifying bet or deposit match. Check the official website for current offers and state-specific promotions.

mainEntity.name: Can I bet on NFL games live?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, most major sportsbooks offer live betting on NFL games. You can place bets during the game as odds change in real-time. Features include live moneylines, spreads, over/under, and same-game parlays. FanDuel, BetMGM, and DraftKings all have excellent live betting platforms.

mainEntity.name: What is a parlay bet in NFL betting?

acceptedAnswer.text: A parlay combines multiple individual bets into one wager. All selections must win for the parlay to win. The advantage is higher potential payouts, but the risk is greater since one loss means the entire parlay loses. Same-game parlays allow you to combine bets on one game, popular with NFL betting.

mainEntity.name: How much should I bet on NFL games?

acceptedAnswer.text: Use proper bankroll management - bet only 1-5% of your total bankroll per bet. Never bet more than you can afford to lose. If you're losing consistently, take a break and reassess your strategy. Remember that sportsbooks have an edge, so profitable betting is challenging even for experts.

mainEntity.name: Which sportsbook has the best mobile app for NFL betting?

acceptedAnswer.text: FanDuel and DraftKings have the highest-rated mobile apps for NFL betting, both with 4.6+ stars on app stores. Both offer fast bet placement, live odds updates, push notifications for promotions, and smooth user interfaces. Test multiple apps to find which feels best for your betting style.
